sentences.sentence: Generalists, on the other hand, know a lot about a wide range of subjects and view the whole with all its connections.
sentences.translation: 另一方面，通才者对广泛的主题了解甚多，并通过所有的联系来观察整体。

sentences.sentence: In this age of generalists, it pays to have specific knowledge or skills.
sentences.translation: 在这个通才时代，具备某些专业知识或技能大有裨益。
创业家必须要成为通才。
